title: The Secret of Debed
overview: The events of the TV series develop in the village of Debed of Lori region, where Araks was born and lived 25 years of her life. Araks life changes drastically after marriage - violence, abuse and rudeness in her husband's family. Left with no other choice, Arax decides to run away with her child, but she does not succeed. Under the circumstances, she is away from her child, in another family, and she has to live a different life for some time until she understands where her life has stopped and how to continue living.
